sources.title: The Black Pirates (1954) Anthony Dexter, Martha Roth, Lon Chaney Jr. | Adventure Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
Wild raiders of the tropic seas!
Pirates searching for treasure take over a small town in Central America where they believe the loot is buried, but discover that a church has been built over the spot. They force the townspeople to dig for it, but there are more surprises in store for them than they counted on.

Director: Allen H. Miner
Writers: Fred Freiberger, Johnston McCulley, Al C. Ward
Stars: Anthony Dexter, Martha Roth, Lon Chaney Jr.
Genre: Adventure
